sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_infte_esm_servic_esm_guided_tour"> <x_infte_esm_servic_esm_guided_tour action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <sys_created_by>Divya_M</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-04-19 13:53:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b4b3d3b16f2d5740d69dc8c17c3ee472</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>Divya_M</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-04-19 14:00:35</sys_updated_on> <u_content>View and edit details like choosing a Persona, having a live chat , and get some community help on issues you are facing.</u_content> <u_order>4</u_order> <u_placement>left</u_placement> <u_target>esm-toggle</u_target> <u_title>Menu</u_title> </x_infte_esm_servic_esm_guided_tour> </record_update>
